name: Ender Man
description:
Ender Man (alpha)  - a game with elements of parkour, character upgrades and battles.

Control:

  1. AD - move right\left
  2. Space - jump
  3. Shift - run
  4. E - attack\break
  5. R - respawn

Ender Man (alpha) v.0.1 (Indie studio - KhaydarovR)

Author - Khaydarov Razil (Хайдаров Разил)

Mechanics: 

  1. Movement 
  2. Wall climbing 
  3. Battle with enemies 
  4. Coins 
  5. Character upgrade
